existing_features.title: Update the username input progress bar to use the blue accent color (--accent) for the fill so the progress is visible
Update the room title input progress bar to use the blue accent color (--accent) for the fill so the progress is visible
Show the username input progress bar indicator only when the user is actively typing in the username field (on focus/input activity)
Show the room title input progress bar indicator only when the user is actively typing in the room title field (on focus/input activity)

projectName: Make progress bars visible with blue fill and show only when typing
